Event.name: Subsisting
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> survives a situation with some <fen>Support</fen>, which tends to be far below the accustomed or standard level expected. The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Support</fen> is responsible for the <fen>Entity</fen>'s survival may be mentioned, as well as the <fen>Duration</fen> for which the situation lasts.
<ex><fex name="Entity">Harry</fex> <t>subsisted</t> <fex name="Support">on ramen and cheap beer</fex> through college.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The living organism which requires the <fen>Support</fen> to survive.
<ex><fex name="Entity">He</fex> <t>lived</t> on peanuts until she came along.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Support
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The resource that the <fen>Entity</fen> relies on to survive through a situation.
<ex>Harry managed to <t>subsist</t> <fex name="Support">on ramen and cheap beer</fex> through college.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The amount of time that the <fen>Entity</fen> survives with the help of the <fen>Support</fen>.
<ex>John <t>lived</t> on whatever he could find in dumpsters <fex name="Duration">for three years</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The degree to which the <fen>Support</fen> is responsible for the survival of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>She was <fex name="Degree">barely</fex> <t>subsisting</t> on the allowance her parents sent her every month.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: live (on).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: survive a situation by using or consuming.
